content: This story comes at a perfect time for me. I’ve recently made the hard commitment: I’m going to move to Seattle by June 10th, 2017, job or no job. It’s a scary thought, but I think it’s also cleared my head and clarified my goal. I also thankfully have a decent safety net in Seattle and plenty of savings to make it all work. But even if I didn’t, I think I would still set the exact same goal. Thanks for your writing Ben (do you mind if I call you Ben?). It’s really be inspiring me lately!
